title: Doctor Who - Who on Earth is Tom Baker - Audio + Video
description:
Doctor Who - Who on Earth is Tom Baker - Audio + Video

Who on the Earth is Tom Baker?  

Well, the simple answer to that is that he was the 4th actor to play 
the Doctor in the BBC masterpiece (1963-2008) called Doctor Who.  

His tenure ranged from 1974 to 1981 and a lot of people consider him 
to be &#039;their doctor&#039; as in the actor whom most influenced them while 
becoming a lifelong fan of this brilliant time travel adventure.  
 <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Baker" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Baker</a>

Many Americans will consider Tom to be &#039;their Doctor&#039; as the US PBS
stations started to air this series quite heavy in the 70&#039;s, and of course
under the direction of John Nathan Turner and multiple other talents, some 
of the Tom Baker episodes are timeless classics.  

This bit-torrent package contains two items;

1) Tom Baker wrote an autobiography titled "Who on Earth is Tom Baker" 
which appears to have been published in 1997.  As will soon become quite 
obvious, Tom also read his book for an audio release.  I can&#039;t find anything
about the audio release, but in my years of collecting every type of media 
related to Doctor Who, I obviously found this audiobook online somewhere.  It 
is sampled at a terribly low rate of 32k, but it&#039;s listenable and is the only
version I have ever seen.   Can ANYONE, please, who has this audio share it at 
a better sample rate like at 320k, cause after all we are not living in the age 
of modems and 20 MEG hard drives anymore...   :)  

2) Apparently a company called Reeltime Pictures did a very in depth interview
with Tom in 1991 and created a VHS tape which has the exact same name;
"Who on Earth is Tom Baker?"    It is included as 5 MP4 video files.  If you 
can&#039;t see them on your computer just download Apple ITunes, VLC Player or my 
favorite GOMPlayer.   All free of course.  Just google those.   And with this 
video, once again if someone has a higher quality version please do share it. 
Hell, just upload the whole DVD if you have it and thanks in advance.  

Enjoy life, and enjoy Doctor Who. 

The Friendly Neighborhood Execution Beast
